summary:
This mod slightly changes the faces of several NPC\'s.
It is bugged however and I ask for help.
See inside for more.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This mod slightly changes the faces of several NPC\'s.
These are (mostly) not big changes, but I think they will make the game more enjoyable.

Al changes are made with foretrenty\'s Skyrim NPC editor (see credits at bottom for link).

Everyone is allowed to use this mod as he/she sees fit, but credits (both to foretrenty and me) are nice.
I also disapprove of using this mod for making money.

James2510


Help:

It is bugged however. I used the NPC Editor. After I was finished I added all files to a 7zip-archive. Installed with NMM, but when I start the game, it crashes before going to the main menu. It doesn\'t conflict with any mods installed with NMM (I uninstalled them all).

I would appreciate it if someone is willing to take a look at these files and search for the problem. I use the latest Skyrim version (which get patched automatically) and the latest version of the NPC Editor. If you need anymore info, just let me know. I will do my best to provide with needed.

I am not an experienced modder (as you\'ve most certainly noticed), and this is the first mod ever I am uploading.

Changes:

Aela the Huntress:
 - removed warpaint
 - gave more femine features

Delphine:
 - Changed hair colour from platinum blond to chestnut

Iona:
 - raised ayebrows a little
 - gave female stance

Jordis:
 - gave female stance

Lydia:
 - set essential to true
 - set level scheme to two-handed
 - removed steel sword and added steel greatsword
 - changed stance to female
 - changed har colour from black to blacktrue (which is darker)
 - raised her eyebrows a little bit
 - changed eye-colour to dark blue

Mirabelle Ervine:
 - Raised eyebrows a lttle bit
 - Changed eyecolour from hazel brown to ice blue

Sapphire:
 - Changed hair colour from dark brown to blue black
 - raised eyebrows a little bit to make her look more stern

Silda the Unseen:
 - lowered eyebrows a bit
 - gave her some more feminine facial features

Vex:
 - Changed hair colour from bright grey to platinum blond
 - changed eye colour from hazel brown to light blue

Ysolda:
 - Changed hair style
 - Changed eye colour from amber to dark blue



Version history:

 - 0.5 initial release

Credits:

Bethesda for Skyrim.

foretrenty for his Skyrim NPC Editor
Skyrim NPC Editor on Skyrim Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554
author: James2510
